Joseph tells us about four major events in his life. Have students identify the four events. (The death of his brother, Alvin; his job doing manual labor; the experience of digging for a silver mine; and his marriage to Emma Hale.) Discuss how each event may have prepared Joseph to receive the plates and complete his life’s mission. (For example, you may want to ask: How might the experience of courting and marrying Emma have helped Joseph in his preparation?)
